Plot: With the true culprit on the loose after killing his wife and daughter in a wrongful accident, a man seeks vengeance for his loved ones, only to find himself tangled in a game of politics and corruption.
Title: Justice
Writer: Juan C. García (story), Juan C. García
Director: A. Furkan Gündogan, David S. Vardanyan
Actors: Steven Holmes, Al Dales, Blaine Perrin, Max Teichman
